gliders.name: Lunare Scuderia
gliders.desc: A sporty platform with excellent performance for building a strong Engine.

gliders.name: Conqueror
gliders.desc: Raw power and strong strafing. A stubborn-handling ship that can take a hit.

gliders.name: Helix
gliders.desc: A competitive engine package with solid driveability.

gliders.name: Asera
gliders.desc: 'I AM AN ALIEN'. Asera ships boost like no other.

gliders.name: ESA-AGR
gliders.desc: It's all about balance. A true jack of all trades.

gliders.name: Wallace-RG
gliders.desc: A thoroughbred racing machine at its core, WALLACE-RG ships handle like no other.

gliders.name: Sulha
gliders.desc: Fearsome engine capabilities and a bare-bones chassis. A true glass cannon.

gliders.name: Mantis
gliders.desc: A mean engine that stays agile but has subpar durability.

gliders.name: Akhal-Tech
gliders.desc: A fragile but stable ship that sure goes fast!

gliders.name: Koeniggswerth
gliders.desc: The OG masters of the tank, a really stable platform.

gliders.name: Behemoth
gliders.desc: The tank among tanks, made on Io to weather any condition.

gliders.name: Buran
gliders.desc: Sturdy, with strong Thrust, and rapid up-to-speed times, but low in driveability.

details.name: BASE
details.desc: Upgrading your Propulsor will increase your maximum speed while also boosting power and acceleration.

details.name: 8-TA
details.desc: The OCTONIC 8-TA, the step-in Propulsor model.

details.name: Draper v1
details.desc: Icaro prefers to go all-in on Top Speed where they can.

details.name: F460
details.desc: Ferox Propulsors grant not only Top Speed, but also acceleration and Boost power.

details.name: 8-TE
details.desc: OCTONIC provides the classic Propulsor experience. Good Top Speed and decent Thrust.

details.name: Breda v1
details.desc: The new Breda model from Icaro now provides a minimal Thrust enhancement.

details.name: Draper v2
details.desc: The Draper v2 leaves nothing on the table when it comes to Top Speed in A-Class!

details.name: F570
details.desc: The F570 provides the most balanced Propulsor platform in Class A.

details.name: 8-TI
details.desc: The 8-TI is the benchmark Class S Propulsor, balanced all-around.

details.name: Breda v2
details.desc: Icaro's Breda v2 model is the ultimate Top Speed Propulsor of its class. To the stars and beyond!

details.name: F690
details.desc: Ferox's F690 is their best-balanced Propulsor, maximizing both ship stats!

details.name: Signature Sulha
details.desc: The embodiment of Sulha's philosophy of going fast, avoiding walls, and overheating easily.

details.name: Signature Mantis
details.desc: The custom Mantis Propulsor provides the most balanced Propulsor of its class.

details.name: Signature Lunare
details.desc: Fragile and light, but with mighty Top Speed & Thrust bite. A-la Lunare glass cannon.

details.name: Signature Conqueror
details.desc: An all or nothing Propulsor by Conqueror. Lots of Thrust is for chumps!

details.name: BASE
details.desc: Stabilizers increase steering and magnetic grip.

details.name: Alfa55
details.desc: Stability means grip, and you'll find the pinnacle of Stability in Magna products.

details.name: Beta55
details.desc: The Beta55, a tuned version of Alfa55. Provides twice the grip.

details.name: Alto
details.desc: The best balance of Stability & Steering can be found in Airbender products.

details.name: Rigel
details.desc: Orion Stabilizers are the benchmark Stabilizers. Good grip without sacrificing much Steering.

details.name: Cirrus
details.desc: The Cirrus is the step-in Class A Stabilizer model. A definite upgrade from everything Class B.

details.name: Bellatrix
details.desc: The Orion Bellatrix is Orion's benchmark Class A Stabilizer. Solid performance in both stats.

details.name: Gamma60
details.desc: With the Gamma60, Magna provides the ultimate grip in its class.

details.name: Mintaka
details.desc: The Mintaka is an upgraded version of the Bellatrix. Now with grip that rivals Magna!

details.name: Cumulus
details.desc: The Cumulus is an upgraded Cirrus. The fluxcoil design got adjusted to provide a boost in steering.

details.name: Storm
details.desc: The Airbender Storm provides the ultimate balanced between Stability and Steering!

details.name: Betelgeuse
details.desc: The Betelgeuse is Orion's answer to 'perfection.' Great Stability and Steering all in one package!

details.name: Zeta70
details.desc: Unparalleled Stability with the pinnacle product from Magna: the Magna Zeta70.

details.name: Signature Wallace
details.desc: All of WRC's ship control knowledge poured into one package. Unparalleled performance.

details.name: Signature Helix
details.desc: Helix has kept deficits as low as possible. Providing massive performance without much sacrifice.

details.name: Signature ESA-AGR
details.desc: 'Perfectly balanced, as all things should be.' The mantra ESA-AGR goes by. No exceptions.

details.name: Signature Buran
details.desc: With this Stabilizer, Buran seeks to offer the best grip without sacrificing Top Speed.

details.name: BASE
details.desc: Rudders control steering and strafing.

details.name: Castellanus
details.desc: Airbender's oldest Rudder model. Before Strafe upgrades on Rudders.

details.name: Svelto X
details.desc: Nimblelab's Rudders strives to provide the best balance between Steering and Strafing.

details.name: Lovelock
details.desc: Plagiarized from Nimblelab's Svelto X? Maybe, but Oikos squeezed out a bit more Steering performance.

details.name: Stratus
details.desc: Airbender lives by POWER Steering in their Rudder products. It's Steer or bust.

details.name: Svelto K
details.desc: The Svelto K has the perfect stat balance for entering a new classification.

details.name: Darwin
details.desc: A supercharged Class-B Lovelock. Steering power is almost doubled, good enough for Class-A.

details.name: Nimbus
details.desc: Another prime example of Airbenders' commitment to Steering prowess.

details.name: Harper
details.desc: Unlike the Nimbus, the Harper has a little bit of Strafe power.

details.name: Tornado
details.desc: The Tornado, Airbender's answer to Oikos, has best-in-class Steering.

details.name: Svelto Y
details.desc: The Svelto Y, Nimblelab's best attempt at merging Steering & Strafing into one.

details.name: Tansley
details.desc: The benchmark Rudder for Class S. Great stat distribution with focus on Steering.

details.name: Hurricane
details.desc: Nothing is left to chance. Full 'PLUS ULTRA' in the Steering department!

details.name: Signature Wallace
details.desc: By sacrificing Durability, WRC pulls the ultimate Steering & Strafing power out of their Rudder.

details.name: Signature Lunare
details.desc: The Lunare Rudder strives for the best Steer/Strafe stats while sacrificing as little as possible.

details.name: Signature Behemoth
details.desc: Behemoth's answer to ESA's Rudder. No strafing power, but less stat sacrifice overall.

details.name: Signature ESA-AGR
details.desc: ESA-AGR again strives for best stat balance distribution, but had to sacrifice Stability.

details.name: BASE
details.desc: Stronger and lighter Hulls increase max speed, damage resistance, and Heat dissipation.

details.name: Lìng
details.desc: Durability means impact resistance, but also Heat dissipation, and QiQi know that very well.

details.name: 45P15
details.desc: Armoden Hulls provide unparalleled Durability compared to competitors.

details.name: 8-TM
details.desc: OCTONIC Hulls focus on attaining the best balance between Top Speed and Durability.

details.name: Yi
details.desc: The benchmark Class A Hull provided by QiQi. Good Durability coupled with decent Top Speed power.

details.name: 8-TN
details.desc: A perfected 8-TM. The 8-TN has flawless stat balance vs. base model.

details.name: P4RM4
details.desc: Looking for the best Durability in its class? Look no further than the P4RM4.

details.name: Èr
details.desc: The top-shelf Class A Hull by QiQi. Solid Durability coupled with good Top Speed.

details.name: 8-TW
details.desc: Lightweight materials and superb aerodynamics give the 8-TW outstanding Top Speed capabilities.

details.name: Sàn
details.desc: QiQi spared nothing to set the bar for Class S Hulls with the Sàn.

details.name: 8UCKL3R
details.desc: Putting the 'T' in Tank. When you are afraid of taking damage. Arm yourself with a 8UCKL3R!

details.name: Signature Koeniggswerth
details.desc: Complete protection as expected from the armor pioneers at Koeniggswerth!

details.name: Signature Akhal-Tech
details.desc: This beauty by AKHAL is the best mid-range Hull in its class.

details.name: Signature Buran
details.desc: The lightest materials guarantee the best Top Speed. Worst-in-class Durability though.

details.name: Signature Behemoth
details.desc: Behemoth is new in the Durability market. They built this Hull as an alternative to Koeniggswerth.

details.name: BASE
details.desc: Intercoolers dissipate Heat and improve Boost power.

details.name: F850
details.desc: The F850 is the step-in Intercooler model for Class B ships.

details.name: 70W3R
details.desc: Armoden Intercoolers balance Thrust with good Durability.

details.name: Uriel
details.desc: ThrustLance Intercoolers invest heavily in Thrust. You want pure acceleration? Look no further.

details.name: Gabriel
details.desc: The Gabriel sets the bar for the Intercoolers in Class A.

details.name: F880
details.desc: The F880 is the 'new normal' for Class A Intercoolers. Outpacing the older Gabriel model.

details.name: K33P
details.desc: Another case of perfect Intercooler stat balance, achieved by Armoden.

details.name: F980
details.desc: The F980 is the improved F880 model by Ferox. Increasing its Thrust performance.

details.name: C457L3
details.desc: The C457L3 is as close to perfect stat balance as Armoden could hustle for Class S.

details.name: Michael
details.desc: Thrust or bust. The ThrustLance Michael.

details.name: F990
details.desc: With the F990, Ferox achieves a masterful balance between great Thrust and good Durability.

details.name: Signature Behemoth
details.desc: 'A massive kick in the neck when you hit the gas' is Behemoth's tagline for this module.

details.name: Signature ESA-AGR
details.desc: ESA has achieved the perfect stat balance with minimal sacrifice. Good for jack-of-all-trades builds.

details.name: Signature Koeniggswerth
details.desc: Great Thrust and good Durability with minimal sacrifice. The benchmark intercooler.

details.name: Signature Buran
details.desc: Buran resorts again to lightweight materials. Achieves great Thrust, but has to let go of Durability.

details.name: BASE
details.desc: The Electronic Stability Control influences grip and strafing.

details.name: Tengu
details.desc: The Tengu is the baseline E.S.C. module by Gozu.

details.name: Nue
details.desc: The Goza Nue is a slight upgrade over its Tengu predecessor.

details.name: Theta60
details.desc: Magna E.S.Cs tend to be quite balanced in their stats. Good for balanced build seekers.

details.name: AgileZ
details.desc: The AgileZ is the first in Nimblelabs quest for total Strafe performance.

details.name: AgileX
details.desc: Nimblelab held nothing back with this class-A E.S.C. Strafing in its purest form.

details.name: Eta61
details.desc: The benchmark class-A E.S.C. module by Magna. Provides solid stats on both ends.

details.name: AgileK
details.desc: The AgileK provides ultimate-in-class Strafing prowess, whilst still keeping a pip of Stability!

details.name: Oni
details.desc: A solid alternative to the AgileK. Slightly less Strafing power but more Stability.

details.name: Sigma69
details.desc: Magna's best class-A work. The Sigma69 combines great Strafing with solid Grip. Nice!

details.name: Phi70
details.desc: The Phi70 is a modified Sigma69. Maximized Strafe potential and Stability that's... stable.

details.name: Ryuu
details.desc: The ultimate E.S.C. module by Gozu. Maximizes Strafing while holding on to a bit of Stability.

details.name: AgileY
details.desc: Zigzag like a snake. With the AgileY, this won't be a problem!

details.name: Signature Lunare
details.desc: Lunare made minimal stat sacrifices to get this mix of Stability/Strafing power.

details.name: Signature Koeniggswerth
details.desc: No Durability compromise. Top Speed takes a hit, other stats remain strong. A competitive package.

details.name: Signature Mantis
details.desc: A minimal sacrifice of Top Speed to maximize everything else. That was Mantis's vision.

details.name: Signature Asera
details.desc: Maximized Strafing & Stability while balancing out the disadvantages.
